meanings.definition: A passage for entering a place.
meanings.sent1: The entranceways to the museum were grand and welcoming.
meanings.sent2: We walked through the entranceways of the park to start our adventure.
meanings.sent3: The entranceways to the haunted house were decorated with spooky cobwebs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the entranceways to her warm and kind heart.
meanings.sent5: The entranceways to the magical garden were hidden behind a secret door.

meanings.sent1: His entranceways into the room were always dramatic and attention-grabbing.
meanings.sent2: The entranceways of the performers onto the stage were perfectly timed.
meanings.sent3: The cat made a grand entranceways into the room, demanding attention.
meanings.sent4: The entranceways of the new student into the school caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent5: The entranceways of the hero into the battle filled everyone with hope and courage.
